block.p: $250,000 340 West 19th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; exposed-brick walls, renovated windowed kitchen, high ceilings, hardwood floors; maintenance $797, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $259,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$250,000 340 West 19th Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; exposed-brick walls, renovated windowed kitchen, high ceilings, hardwood floors; maintenance $797, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $259,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$849,000 5 East 22nd Street (Madison Greene) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,273-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, balcony, Madison Square Park view; common charge $722; taxes $6,708; listed at $849,000, 7 weeks on market (broker: Newell & Associates)

$935,000 125 East 63rd Street 2-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, maid's room, fireplace, beamed ceilings, south exposure; maintenance $2,118, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $935,000, 5 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Stribling & Associates; Douglas Elliman)

$560,000 342 West 85th Street (Stratton) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a renovated prewar building; elevator, dining area, fireplace, exposed brick walls, 17-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 balconies, south exposure; common charge $399; taxes $3,516; listed at $585,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Klara Madlin Real Estate)

$1.4 million 2 Columbus Avenue (59th Street) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,450-sq.-ft. condo in a recently constructed building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, corner unit, hardwood floors, fitness center in building; common charge $967, taxes $972 (abated); listed at $1.495 million, 4 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$555,000 273 Vanderbilt Avenue 3-family, 4-story brownstone; 2 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, dining area, exposed-brick walls, rear deck in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, den and marble mantels in two simplex units; 18-by-80-ft. lot; taxes $1,800; listed at $590,000, 21 weeks on market (broker: Eva M. Daniels Real Estate)

$500,000 375 16th Street 2-family, 3-story, prewar brick house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, triple parlor, den, rear deck in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other; pine floors in each; needs renovation; 19.6-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,525; listed at $475,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (broker: Warren Lewis Realty)

$589,000 566 Carlton Avenue 2-family, 3-story brownstone; 4 bedrooms, 1 bath, dining room, rear deck in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in simplex; oak parquet floors, marble mantel in each; rear garden, 20-by-80-ft. lot; taxes $900; listed at $589,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Orrichio & Anderson)

$485,000 302 Fairway Green (Fairway Green) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,600-sq.-ft., 13-year-old town house condo; entry hall, dining room, eat-in kitchen with breakfast room, den, rear deck; common charge $250; taxes $12,700; listed at $500,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Larchmont)

$611,000 1 Dickens Street 6-bedroom, 5-bath, 6-year-old ranch; dining foyer, eat-in kitchen, family room, skylights, finished basement, 4-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $7,375; listed at $650,000, 48 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker/Realty Stars)

$7.125 million 15 Willowmere Circle 6-bedroom, 6-bath, 1885 Victorian renovated and expanded in 1998; dining room, library, 3 family rooms, custom kitchen, computer room, 2 fireplaces, wraparound porch, gazebo, guest room above 3-car garage; 1.7-acre lot with boat dock on Long Island Sound; taxes $31,650; listed at $7.4 million, 2 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Old Greenwich; Douglas Elliman Pickering)
